raw_text: DIRCKZE – KAMINI – Loving wife of late Wing. Cmd. Tony Dirckze,​ mother of Rapti and Ravi Dirckze and loving Nana of Raoul and Racquel,​ daughter of J.R.T. and Mary Pereira,​ sister of Chitra Corera and late Ranjit Pereira. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour at 10.00 a.m. on Saturday the 7th of October. Cortege leaves parlour on the same day at 4.00 p.m. for cremation at 4.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (New Crematorium).063451

JAYASURIYA – IVAN (Retd. Deputy Commissioner,​ Educational Publications Dept.),​ dearly beloved husband of Princy,​ loving father of Jayani (Australia) and Prasad (Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority),​ father-in-law of Priyantha (Australia) and Shanika,​ grandfather of Nilesh and Sheneli (Australia),​ Rehan and Natasha,​ son of late Andrew Jayasuriya and late Elizabeth Perera,​ brother of late Bernard,​ late Beatrice,​ late Trixie,​ late Viola,​ late Rev. Fr. Luke,​ late Rev. Fr. Clyde and Claribel (Retd. Teacher,​ Convent of the Child Jesus,​ Ratnapura). Cortege leaves residence at “Jayamuthu”,​ Tudella Junction,​ Ja-ela at 3.30 p.m. on Sunday,​ 8th October 2023 for Burial at Kanuwana Roman Catholic Cemetery. Tel. 0112236280 /​ 0772267095.064186
